## see ibutton dowload scripts at https://lukemiller.org/index.php/2012/07/r-scripts-for-downloading-ibutton-thermochron-dataloggers/

```{r}
#read in ibutton temp data from 1922L sensors

excel_file <- "data/Trimmed1922L.xlsx")
sheets <- excel_sheets(excel_file)
for (sheet in sheets) {
  df <- read_excel(excel_file, sheet = sheet)
   # Specify the output file path for each sheet
  output_file <- paste0(sheet, ".csv")
  
  # Write the data frame to a CSV file
  write.csv(df, file = output_file, row.names = FALSE)
}

```
